name: dsl
description: Runs DSL queries against OpenSearch for client ingestion log analysis

name: ppl
description: Runs PPL (Piped Processing Language) queries against OpenSearch. Requires SQL plugin to be installed.

name: sql
description: Runs SQL queries against OpenSearch. Requires SQL plugin to be installed.

name: cloudwatch-dsl
description: Runs DSL queries translated to CloudWatch Logs Insights for benchmarking. Requires cw_log_group workload parameter.

name: cloudwatch-ppl
description: Runs PPL-equivalent queries against CloudWatch Logs (MANUAL TRANSLATION REQUIRED). Requires cw_log_group workload parameter.

name: cloudwatch-sql
description: Runs SQL-equivalent queries against CloudWatch Logs (MANUAL TRANSLATION REQUIRED). Requires cw_log_group workload parameter.
